settings.heading: Animal Health
settings.text: Explore the expansive Animal Health Department at 53 Farm and Hardware in Ardmore, AL—a key part of our store and a favorite among local farmers and animal owners. Stocked with a wide selection of vaccines, dewormers, supplements, wound care, and fly control products, this department is designed to support the health and well-being of your livestock and pets. Whether you're caring for cattle, horses, poultry, or companion animals, our friendly and knowledgeable staff is ready to help you find the right products for your needs. Come see why animal health is such a big focus at 53 Farm and Hardware!

settings.text: Looking for top-quality cattle feed and unbeatable service? Visit the popular cattle feed department at 53 Farm and Hardware in Ardmore, AL! We carry a wide selection of trusted brands and premium blends to keep your herd healthy and productive year-round. Whether you're feeding calves, beef cattle, or dairy cows, our knowledgeable team is here to help you choose the right nutrition for your operation. With competitive prices, dependable inventory, and a reputation for excellence, it’s no wonder local farmers trust 53 Farm and Hardware for all their livestock feed needs. Come see why we’re Ardmore’s go-to source for cattle feed!
